description: Orangish-red sand texture using sand pattern with warm desert coloration

base_colors.note: Orangish-red base colors: baseR = 200, baseG = 100, baseB = 50. Green varies 80% (30*0.8=24), blue varies 60% (30*0.6=18)

primary_noise.note: Same sand pattern as regular sand: sin(x * 0.8 + y * 1.1) and cos(x * 0.5 - y * 0.9)

secondary_noise.note: Secondary noise to match sand's dual noise pattern

red_sand_algorithm.note: Green and blue channels vary less to maintain redness

generation_algorithm.step1: Generate dual noise: noise1_rs = sin(x * 0.8 + y * 1.1), noise2_rs = cos(x * 0.5 - y * 0.9)
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply base colors with reduced variation: r = 200 + variation_rs, g = 100 + (variation_rs * 0.8), b = 50 + (variation_rs * 0.6)
generation_algorithm.step5: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range using Math.max(0, Math.min(255, value))
generation_algorithm.note: Uses identical sand noise pattern but with orangish-red coloration and reduced green/blue variation

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded RED_SAND texture algorithm

atlas_coordinates.note: RED_SAND atlas coordinates from BlockType.java - was obsidian coords

validation_notes.pattern_complexity: Dual sine/cosine noise generation identical to regular sand
validation_notes.coordinate_system: Uses per-tile coordinates (globalX % texturePixelSize) for self-contained tiles
special_features: Orangish-red base color for desert sand appearance
Same speckled noise pattern as regular sand
Reduced green/blue variation to maintain warm red tones
Green channel varies 20% less than red (0.8f multiplier)
Blue channel varies 40% less than red (0.6f multiplier)
Self-contained per-tile noise for consistent texture tiling
No special patterns - pure noise-based texture like regular sand

color_comparison.variation_range: ±15 for red, ±12 for green, ±9 for blue

technical_notes: Identical noise algorithm to regular sand (frequencies 0.8, 1.1, 0.5, -0.9)
Same variation multiplier (30) but different channel scaling
Maintains sand texture feel with desert coloration
